Ayushmann Khurrana Wiki | Age | Height | Biography | Wife | Family

Bolly Reporter
4 months ago

Ayushmann khurrana is a versatile actor, anchor, writer and singer. Ayushmann has started his career as a radio jockey and later became VJ in MTV India. He has also participated in the reality show “roadies” and became a winner of the same show in the second season. He has started his filming carer with the movie called “Vicky donor” which was a big hit in the film industry and also won the Filmfare fare for the best male debut award for the same movie.

Biography & Wiki

Ayushmann khurrana’s real name is Nishant Khurana. He was born on 14 September 1984 in Chandigarh, India. Hence, his current age is 35 years. Ayushmann’s Zodiac is Virgo. At the age of 4, when Ayushmann Khurrana watched Madhuri Dixit‘s ‘Tezaab’ (1988) at a theatre, he decided to become an actor.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Ayushmann Khurrana Family Members

Ayushmann’s father, P Khurrana who is an astrologer & Numerologist and his mother’s name is Poonam Khurrana who is a housewife. He has a brother “Apartshakti Khurrana” who was also a radio jockey. However, his brother has started his career in the film line with his debut movie “Dangal” with big star cast as “Aamir Khan“.

Education and School, College

Ayushmann khurrana did his schooling from St. John’s High School, Chandigarh. Ayushmann has completed Graduation in English literature from DAV College, Chandigarh, India. After that, he went to the School of Communication Studies, Panjab University, Chandigarh to complete his Master’s degree in Mass Communication.

Girls, affairs, spouse name

He has a girlfriend from childhood and got married to the same girl named “Tahira Khurranna” who is also a close family friend. He met Tahira at the age of 16 and decided, at that point itself, that he would marry her. Once when they were together at Tahira’s house and spend some quality time, her father caught them.

Ayushmann has a son “Virajveer Khurrana” and a daughter “Varuksha Khurrana“.

Favorite Things and Hobbies

Ayushmann Khurrana filmography

Ayushmann worked as an RJ and then shifted on to work as a VJ with MTV, India during the initial phase of his career. He won the second season of reality television show MTV Roadies in 2004 and started an anchoring career.

Ayushmann made his film debut in 2012 with the romantic comedy Vicky Donor. For this movie, he sang “Pani Da Rang“, which he had written and composed with Rochak Kohli back in 2003. For this song, he earned the Filmfare Award for Best Male Playback Singer.

In 2017 there were two films released, Bareilly Ki Barfi and Shubh Mangal Saavdhan, both were commercially successful. In 2018 he starred Andhadhun and Badhaai Ho, both of them become top-grossing Hindi films of the year. Andhadhun earned ₹4.56 billion. In 2019, Article 15 is also a massive hit.

Awards & Recognitions

  • In 2013, Ayushmann won two Filmfare Awards for Best Male Debut and Best Male Playback Singer.
  • He won Zee Cine Awards in Best Male Debut category for Vicky Donor.
  • At that same year, he won the International Indian Film Academy Awards (IIFA) for Star Debut of the Year for Vicky Donor.
  • In 2019, he won Best Actor in Filmfare Awards for Andhadhun.
  • He won National Film Awards for Best Actor for Andhadhun in 2019.

Salary and Net Worth

Ayushmann has an estimated net worth of almost $6 Million. He earns almost Rs.2-3 crores for every movie he plays as a salary.

Facts about Ayushmann Khurrana

  • In his initial days on TV, he actually donated his sperms.
  • He loves writing Hindi poems and is an active blogger.
  • His favorite co-star is Bhumi Pedneka.
  • It happened in 2013 when Ayushmann’s servant committed suicide at his Goregaon apartment in Mumbai. However, the actor was not accused of the same.
  • Between an actor and an RJ, he prefers being an RJ because it enables him to be vocal about his thoughts.
